snippet.title: Rogue Legacy Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rogue Legacy has launched, and is now available on Steam, GoG.com, Gamersgate, Desura, and at www.roguelegacy.com.

Desura: http://www.desura.com/games/rogue-legacy
Gamersgate: http://www.gamersgate.com/DD-RLEGACY/rogue-legacy
Good Old Games: http://www.gog.com/gamecard/rogue_legacy
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/241600/

The game is also fully purchasable and playable on Mac via OnLive and the magic of cloud gaming.  Try out the free 30 minute trial here:

http://games.onlive.com/launch/trial/rogue-legacy


Check out the game at:
http://www.roguelegacy.com

From the makers of Don't Shit Your Pants, comes a new take on the roguelike genre. Rogue Legacy is a side-scrolling semi-rogue-like action game where you battle against the ghastly creatures residing within the walls of a procedurally generated castle. As you die you can pass your knowledge to your offspring, unlocking new abilities and making them stronger and tougher than ever before. It is the cycle of life and death... and death... and death. It is your legacy.
